ssot__ShoppingCartProductEngagement__dlm.name: Shopping Cart Product Engagement
ssot__ShoppingCartProductEngagement__dlm.description: The Shopping Cart Product Engagement DMO represents data captured from user actions, such as adding and removing items from a shopping cart.

ssot__AdjustedTotalProductAmount__c.description: The product’s adjusted price, if applicable.

ssot__AdjustmentAmount__c.description: The amount the prices was adjusted, if applicable.

ssot__CurrencyId__c.description: A reference ID to the currency.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__DeliveryAmount__c.description: The delivery amount for each item.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__IsGiftOrder__c.description: An indicator if an order is a gift.

ssot__ProductId__c.description: A reference ID to what's intended to be sold, for example goods, services, bundles, and made-to-order products.

ssot__ProductAmount__c.description: The product quantity unit price for line item.

ssot__ProductBrandName__c.description: The brand name of a product.

ssot__ProductCategoryName__c.description: The product category, such as shoes and hats, within a larger catalog.

ssot__ProductColorName__c.description: The product color for search results.

ssot__ProductDisplayPositionnumber__c.description: The position number the product is shown on a list.

ssot__ProductImageURL__c.description: The link to page that hosts the product photo or image.

ssot__ProductPrice__c.description: The product price displayed on a search result.

ssot__ProductQuantity__c.description: The product package quantity displayed on a search result.

ssot__ProductSKUnumber__c.description: The stock keeping unit (SKU) of a displayed product.

ssot__ProductStyleName__c.description: The product style displayed on a search result.

ssot__ProductTaxAmount__c.description: The amount of tax on product line item.

ssot__ProductViewURL__c.description: The link to detail page about the displayed product.

ssot__PromotionCouponId__c.description: A reference ID to payment in the form of a voucher entitling holder to a discount on particular product.

ssot__ShoppingCartEngagementId__c.description: A reference ID to data retrieved from user action at ordering stage of online shopping process.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Shopping Cart Product Engagement DMO.

ssot__ShoppingCartProductItemName__c.description: The name given to product in a shopping cart.
